===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[steal]]; to [[snatch]]
#: {{zh-x|我們 的 錢 被 偷 了。|We had our money '''stolen'''.}}
#* {{zh-x|扒手 偷 了 她 的 皮 夾子 跑 了。|The pickpocket '''pinched''' her purse and ran away.}}
# [[stealthily]]; [[secretly]]; [[covertly]]
#: {{zh-x|偷看|to peek; to peep}}
#: {{zh-x|偷聽|to eavesdrop}}
# [[thief]]; [[burglar]]
#: {{zh-x|小偷|thief}}
# to have an extra-marital [[relationship]]
#: {{zh-x|偷情|adultery}}
#: {{zh-x|偷腥|to have an affair}}
#: {{zh-x|偷漢|to take a lover}}
# to [[while away]] without purpose
#: {{zh-x|偷懶|to be lazy}}
#: {{zh-x|偷生|to live without purpose}}
